CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Aethelgard Power Grid relative to Stellar Grid Solutions?
SRP.A: Aethelgard Power Grid is {below} Stellar Grid Solutions in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Zenith Utility Services relative to Aethelgard Power Grid?
SRP.A: Zenith Utility Services is {above} Aethelgard Power Grid in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Aethelgard Power Grid relative to Zenith Utility Services?
SRP.A: Aethelgard Power Grid is {below} Zenith Utility Services in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total electricity demand?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Azure Energy Distribution}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total electricity demand?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Zenith Utility Services}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Stellar Grid Solutions's minimum Electricity Demand in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Stellar Grid Solutions's minimum Electricity Demand is in {1959}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Zenith Utility Services's maximum Electricity Demand in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Zenith Utility Services's maximum Electricity Demand is in {1961}.

NC.Q: Between 1956 and 1968, did the total Electricity Demand experience a larger or smaller change than between 1955 and 1968?
NC.A: The change in total electricity demand between 1956 and 1968 was {smaller} than between 1955 and 1968.

NC.Q: Between 1965 and 1980, was the average total Electricity Demand higher or lower than between 1962 and 1968?
NC.A: The average total electricity demand between 1965 and 1980 was {higher} than between 1962 and 1968.

NC.Q: Between 1971 and 1979, was the average total Electricity Demand higher or lower than between 1964 and 1981?
NC.A: The average total electricity demand between 1971 and 1979 was {higher} than between 1964 and 1981.

NC.Q: Between 1961 and 1976, was the average total Electricity Demand higher or lower than between 1973 and 1977?
NC.A: The average total electricity demand between 1961 and 1976 was {lower} than between 1973 and 1977.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Azure Energy Distribution} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Stellar Grid Solutions and Borealis Electric Cooperative first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Stellar Grid Solutions and Borealis Electric Cooperative first exchanged leading positions in {1957}.
